summary: Premium graphic design studio website for 'Kaur's Creation' with navy blue and gold luxury aesthetic, featuring sticky header, hero section with 3D avatar, services grid, masonry portfolio gallery, client testimonials, and elegant footer
architectural_notes: Navy blue and gold luxury color palette throughout
Ultra-modern, high-end studio aesthetic with professional white space
4K resolution with sharp edges and vector-quality elements
Portfolio gallery order: latest uploaded designs first, followed by existing mockups, with duplicate detection
About section with personal designer bio emphasizing creativity, color theory, typography, and brand uniqueness

existing_features.title: Create a sticky header component with navy blue background featuring the 'KC' logo on the left and navigation menu items (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Contact, Review) on the right with gold hover effects
Create a hero section with bold headline 'Elevate Your Brand', a gold call-to-action button labeled 'Get Started', and a 3D designer character avatar positioned on the right side

Create a services section with a clean grid layout displaying all 11 services: Logo Design, Business Card Design, Flex Design, Brochure Design, Pamphlet Design, Banner Design, Packaging Design, Label Design, Social Media Post Design, Website Template, and Stationery Design, each with a minimalist gold icon
Create a portfolio section with a large masonry grid gallery displaying mixed Print, Digital, and Branding mockups without any filter options
Create a testimonial section titled 'What Our Clients Say' featuring reviews from five clients: Jasleen Kaur, Nisar Mohammad, Deepak Kumar, Jaspreet Singh, and Gagandeep Singh
Create a minimalist footer with dark navy background displaying 'Thank you for choosing us' in elegant gold lettering

Apply a premium Navy Blue and Gold color palette throughout the entire website with luxury aesthetic, using clean modern sans-serif typography, sharp edges, professional white space, and vector-quality elements
Render all generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Add contact information to the footer component: email (Kaurscreation009@gmail.com) and phone number (+91-9988302842)

Add social media links to the footer component: LinkedIn (www.linkedin.com/in/sharandeep-kaur-347285376), Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61582726687717), and Instagram (Kaurs.creation_official)

Replace the placeholder portfolio gallery images with the 21 uploaded portfolio images (1.jpg through 18.jpg, coffee copy.jpg, amul.jpg, mockup.jpg) showcasing the user's actual design work including logos, business cards, brochures, packaging designs, social media posts, and client work
Replace the current KC logo placeholder throughout the website with the actual Kaur's Creation logo from the uploaded image (1.jpg)

Reorder the portfolio gallery in PortfolioSection.tsx to display the newly uploaded portfolio images at the top of the gallery, followed by the previously uploaded images (1.jpg through 18.jpg, coffee copy.jpg, amul.jpg, mockup.jpg) as design mockups below them
Remove any duplicate images from the portfolio gallery to ensure each design appears only once
Add a white border to all portfolio images in the PortfolioSection.tsx component to ensure consistent and uniform appearance across all design mockups in the masonry gallery

Add text above 'Thank you for choosing us' in the Footer component stating 'We provide many more services as well, and you can contact us for them.' with appropriate styling that matches the navy and gold theme
Replace the 3D designer avatar image in HeroSection component with the uploaded logo reveal video, positioning it beautifully to integrate with the navy background and overall hero section design
Add WhatsApp Business icon and link to the social media icons section in the Footer component alongside the existing LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram icons

Create an About section component positioned between the HeroSection and ServicesSection with the heading 'About' and the following text content: 'Hi, I'm a graphic designer who loves turning ideas into eye-catching designs. I enjoy playing with colors, fonts, and layouts to create visuals that feel fresh and unique. Whether it's a logo, social media post, or full brand design, I'm here to make your brand look awesome and stand out. Let's create something cool together! ðŸŽ¨âœ¨' Style it consistently with the navy blue and gold theme used throughout the website.
Add a white border to the KC logo image in the Header component that appears next to the 'Home' navigation button.

Add the uploaded logo mockup image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-21 at 10.31.00 AM.jpeg showing KC logo on mug and t-shirt) to the portfolio gallery in PortfolioSection.tsx, positioned at the top of the gallery with the same white border treatment as other portfolio images.

Services grid with 11 services (Logo, Business Card, Flex, Brochure, Pamphlet, Banner, Packaging, Label, Social Media, Website Template, Stationery) with gold icons

Reorder portfolio images: new uploads first, then existing mockups, ensuring no duplicates
Add white border to portfolio designs for consistent and uniform appearance
Add text above footer 'Thank you for choosing us' stating 'We provide many more services as well, and you can contact us for them'
